remarks: In an uniform structure, for any entourage ` V ` , there exists a symmetrical entourage smaller than a third of ` V ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jan-2018.)
statement:
ustex3sym $p |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ V e. U ) -> E. w e. U ( `' w = w /\ ( w o. ( w o. w ) ) C_ V ) ) $.
$d U w $.
$d V w $.
$d X w $.
